headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE VACUUM PUMP 53.0 CFM
description: Two Stage Rotary Vacuum Pump     Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise. All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor. Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
